episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 107 - The First Black Bachelorette,  Lindsay Lohan & The Secret Past Lives of Housewives
episodes.summary: Gigi Gorgeous, the transgender model and Internet sensation, answers every question about her transition, love life and career. Heather addresses Lindsay Lohan's thirsty behavior, breaks down The Bachelor, and predicts who the male suitors will be for the new black bachelorette. Plus, Heather's recap of the latest #RHOBH episode.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 106 - Bravo's Amy Phillips & Heather McDonald Talk Britney Spears, Housewives, & If Jen Aniston's Pregnant
episodes.summary: Bravo's impressionist Amy Phillips joins Heather to reenact famous Real Housewives scenes from Scary Island to Luanne's discovery of her fiancé cheating. Plus, Heather breaks down Lifetime's Britney Spears movie and explores the rumors about Jen Anniston's pregnancy.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 105 - Vanderpump Rules' Katie Maloney Schwartz
episodes.summary: Vanderpump Rules' Katie Maloney Schwartz comes to the Juicy Scoop Confessional to confess not only her sins, but the sins of her cast-mates as well. We get Katie's take on the Jax's new spinoff show, Scheena Shay's divorce, LaLa Kent's new face and sooo much more. Plus Heather asks Katie who's coming back next year, will there be any new cast members, and if she plans on having any children anytime soon.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 104 - 50 Shades of Heather
episodes.summary: For Valentine's Day Heather gives her 50 Shades Darker movie review. Christy Brinkley's ex-husband is trolling for 20-year-olds on Instagram. A super Juicy late in life lesbian murder story. Plus, reality TV enthusiast Annabelle DeSisto and host of Adderall and Compliments deconstructs The Bachelor franchise and tells us why Nick should ditch the bad perm and straighten his hair.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop  - Ep - 103 - Chris Franjola Plans Heather's Funeral and Discusses Who Peter's Next Wife Should Be
episodes.summary: Comedian Chris Franjola joins Heather. They get into Brad & Kate Hudson, Bethany Frankel's horrible ex and Beyonce's twins. They share times they've been bullied and they've been the bully. Heather imagines Peter's life after she is dead. Heather recaps RHOBH and moms who stress the importance of being good in bed.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop -Ep - 102 - Kardashian Secrets From Khloe Kardashian's BFF
episodes.summary:
Khloe Kardashians BFFs Malika and Khadijah Haqq, identical twin actresses tell all about dating and marrying pro athletes and other TV personalities. We get into how sharing the same DNA has its ups and downs and the joy of pimping your single twin sister out. Plus who will be giving their Kidney to Khloe.  Heather shares juicy listeners letters and asks serious celebrity plastic surgery questions.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 101 - Solving Real-Life Murder Mysteries With Dateline's Josh Mankiewicz
episodes.summary: Dateline's Josh Mankiewicz answers all of Heather's questions and murder obsessions including what Josh will say when she goes missing. Josh shares tips on how to get away with murder as well times when he has powdered a criminal's nose. He is so juicy and so fun, plus full breakdown of Real Housewives of Beverly Hills.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 100 - Shannon Beador and Sarah Colonna Celebrate Heather's 100th Episode at Hollywood Improv
episodes.summary: Bravo's Shannon Beador and comedian Sarah Colonna join Heather for a live taping of her 💯 show at the Hollywood Improv. Sarah and Heather go deep into celebrity relationships like Julia Roberts & the cameraman, Brad, Angie & Kate Hudson and The Bachelor. RHOC Shannon Beador tells hilarious stories about her life before Real Housewives and answers the audience's questions. So juicy and fun!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 99 - Lance Bass Talks About Escaping Scientology & Britney Spears' First Wedding
episodes.summary: Lance Bass tells about how he attended Brittney Spears first wedding in Vegas and how Leah Remini recruited him into Scientology. They along with Lance's husband Michael Turchin discuss The Bachelor, The Trumps and more. Super Juicy!!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 98 - Was There a Gay Bachelor? Heather Thinks So! Plus A Juicy Serial Lesbian Dater Story!
episodes.summary: Has there already been a gay Bachelor? Heather seems to think so. Join Heather and her guests, comedians Eugene Cordero and Ryan Stanger, as they explore Heather's gay Bachelor theory and do a complete breakdown of the latest Bachelor, Nick. Is he marriage material? Is he a lion or a mouse in the bedroom? And why does he speak so weirdly? Plus a juicy Serial Lesbian Dater story.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 97 - RHONJ's Greg Bennett & Heather's Brush With Killer Lyle Menendez
episodes.summary: RHONJ fans are in for a treat because Greg Bennett drops by the podcast to drop some juicy gossip about the show. Plus, Heather recaps RHOBH, gives us her theory about why the Bachelor is such a mess, and tells us about her brush with killer Lyle Menendez.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop Ep - 96 - Never before told stories about the RHOBH with comedian Guy Branum
episodes.summary: Guy Branum comedian, writer and Heather's former gay work husband joins Heather to reveal never before told stories about the RHOBH and how Heather met each and everyone of them. Then Heather pulls a Leah Remini and tells of how she went to lunch with a Scientologist, got all the Juicy Scoop and lived to tell the tale!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 95 - Celebrity Apprentice Star & Comic Matt Iseman Talks Schwarzenegger, Kardashian Jewel Heist & Heather's New Charity
episodes.summary: Celebrity Apprentice star & comic Matt Iseman tells about how he went from being a medical doctor to a stand up comic. He gives all the juice on Arnold and his co stars. Heather and Matt discuss the Kim Kardashian jewelry heist, who deserves free boob jobs and other worthy charities.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 94 - Lisa Rinna Talks Kim Richards, Wigs & Why She Credits Michael Bolton With Her Marriage
episodes.summary: This could be the Juiciest Episode ever!! Lisa Rinna is uncensored as she talks to Heather about shocking moments from her past. We learn about how Lisa's mom barely escaped being murdered by a serial killer, why Michael Bolton is responsible for her marriage to Harry Hamlin, and we get the inside scoop on her infamous wine-glass-throwing showdown with Kim Richards.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 93 - Chris Franjola, Judge Judy's Husband Leaves Her For Someone Nice, & The Seedy Underworld of Male Tickling Competitions
episodes.summary: Chris Franjola kicks off the New Year by digging into some juicy gossip with Heather. Did Judge Judy's husband leave her for someone younger and nicer? Was Marah Carey sabotaged by Dick Clark Productions on New Year's Eve? Plus Chris tries to explain to Heather how he discovered a documentary about the the seedy underworld of male tickling competition.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 92 - Comedian Jen Kirkman, Cruising In Limos w/ Jason Bateman, & Brandi Glanville
episodes.summary: Jen Kirkman the hilarious comedian and Heather talk about Boston movies and accents, Jackie O and Jen and Justin's marriage. Jen shares the time Justin Beiber thought she was pregnant. Heather reveals the time Jason Bateman picked her up in a limo. They dissect the Joanna Krupa and Brandi Granville court case.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 91- Serial Fatal Attraction
episodes.summary: Heather's last show of 2016 features one of the most terrifying stories she's ever heard. It comes to us from a Juicy Scoop listener who reveals that his lover was leading a double-life, and that when the lies started catching up with the serial dater the attraction became fatal leaving this Juicy Scoop fan fighting for his life. His story is creepy, scary, and it could just as easily happen to you.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 90 - Caitlyn Jenner Runs Into Heather, Sister Wives & Scientology Secrets
episodes.summary: Part 2 of Bravo's Julie & Brandi from People's Couch return to discuss The Goldberg's Jeff Garland, Scientology, sexual harassment and Ivanka Trump. Heather gives details about her Christmas Eve at the Kardasian's and her sisterwife wedding marathon.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 89 - Investigating RHONY's Cocaine Problem with Bravo's Brandy Howard and Julie Goldman
episodes.summary: Is Lamar Odom dating a "little person?" Does One of the New York Housewives still have a VCR problem (VISIBLE COKE RESIDUE PROBLEM)? Why was Sex & the City 2 such a horrible movie? Brandi Howard and Julie Goldman from Bravo's hit TV show "The People's Couch" join Heather to answer all of these questions and more on this episode of Juicy Scoop.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop Ep - 88 - RHOC Shannon Beador's X-Mas Party, Sofia Vergara's Eggs Are Suing Her, Plus Black Chyna & Ron Drama
episodes.summary:
New fan favorite Peter, Heather's husband returns to talk about RHOC Shannon Beador's Christmas party, great deals he found in Newport, Scientology, Mariah Carey, Blac Chyna and Rob and Sofia Vergara's frozen eggs who are suing her. Also, a special holiday segment about the power of listening.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop Ep - 87 - Chris Franjola Part. 2 Chris Talks Scientology & Heather's Husband Get's Fired Over A Seafood Platter
episodes.summary: Chris Franjola part 2 talking Scientology, Madonna's grateful adopted son and Mariah Carey. Heather shares a story of a 93 yr old billionaire and his 11 mistresses. #RHOBH recap. Peter joins Heather and they tell how ordering a seafood platter can get you fired.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 86 - Comedian  Chris Franjola Talks About Fake Kidnappings, Italian Street Justice & Black Chyna
episodes.summary:
Chris Franjola, hilarious comedian from Chelsea Lately and Heather's good friend gets into who Peter would date after Heather dies, 
The Kardashians and why he won't stop for a kidnap victim. Plus Real Housewives of Atlanta and The Affair.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 85 - Comedian Jo Koy & Heather Solve Jon Bennet Ramsey Murder
episodes.summary: Heather & her good friend, comedian Jo Koy, use their keen powers of observation to solve the mystery of Jon Bennet Ramsey's death. Plus Jo Koy's mother gets taken advantage of by Scientologist, Heather's husband Peter "is tired of having to take care of everything," and Brad Pitt gets over Angelina with Kate Hudson.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 84 - Kandi Burruss of Real Housewives of Atlanta
episodes.summary: Bravo's RHOA Kandi Burruss spills all about her cast mates past and present. Heather shares a plot to cancel a nemeses Dry Bar appointment and more juicy stories.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 83 - Hannah Hart, Plus, Serial Sexual Harasser Strikes Again

Then Heather talks to actress, YouTube star and inebriated chef Hannah Hart, about turning in child predators to the police, trying to convince yourself that you're straight, & growing up with a schizophrenic mother and the heart-wrenching struggle to save her.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 82 - Sex, Lies & Saved By The Bell
episodes.summary: Heather interrogates Saved By the Bell creator Peter Engel to get the inside scoop on which costars did or did not have a threesome, was Mario Lopez and his mullet always a woman magnet, & what when wrong with Screech??? Plus, Heather sits down with comedian Tammy Pescatelli to talk about Sister Wives, RHONJ and the secret "little people" skid row in Los Angeles.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 81 - Kelly Dodd vs. Heather & Serial Thanksgiving Stories
episodes.summary: The best serial Thanksgiving stories ever plus RHOA recap and serial sexual harasser update! Also Heather interviews actor Kirk Fogg who shares  the most hilarious and humiliating acting stories ever!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 80 - Dina Manzo of RHONJ Part 2
episodes.summary: Dina Manzo part 2 from RHONJ gives even more juicy scoop about Caroline. Serial sister update! Heather's sisters family attempts to attack her in DC.  Dating advice, fans reveal their adulterous affairs and more!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 79 - Dina Manzo of RHONJ
episodes.summary: RHONJ original Dina Manzo answers all your questions. Dina gives Heather Juicy Scoop that has never been heard. Plus RHONJ and RHOC reunion recaps and more! Super Juicy Thursday edition enjoy!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 78 - Keith Urban Botox Disaster, Celine Dion Finds Love & Sex In The City Is Back!
episodes.summary: Heather gets into the latest gossip about Nicole Kidman, Celine Dion and Samantha from Sex in The City. More Juicy celebrity Late in Life Lesbian news and Serial Roommate plus a real life wing woman whose job is helping men pick up you.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 77 - Serial Roomate, Real Housewives of OC Reunion & Comedian Brad Wollack!
episodes.summary: From Chelsea Lately days, hilarious red headed Jew Brad Wollack joins to discuss Blac Chyna, Angelina and Maddox, Little Women and Real Housewives. Heather shares listeners super juicy  Serial Roommate and Serial Sexual Harasser stories.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 76 - Jon Benet, New Jersey Housewives Reunion & Aura Seeing Psychics!
episodes.summary: Heather recaps the Jon Benet Lifetime movie. Serial Sexual Harraser updates and new stories from listeners. Serial sorority sisters, #RHONJ Reunion most disturbing reveals and a psychic who reads real housewives color auras including Heather's tell us the real truth.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 75 - Tamra Judge Returns
episodes.summary: Tamra Judge from Real Housewives of OC dishes on everything from very present to way past. Some Serial Sexual Harasser updates and personal stories and more! Extra Juicy today!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 74 - Comic Trish Suhr & Serial Sexual Harasser Update
episodes.summary: The fallout from Heather sharing the audio of the Podcastone owner asking to hold Heather's breasts is revealed. Comic Trish Suhr tells her Hollywood tales. Heather impersonates Real Housewives of New Jersey and tells stories of weird college dorm mates

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 73 -  Serial Sexual Harasser & Epic Serial Dater Story
episodes.summary: Heather finally shares why she left Podcastone and shares the audio you've been dying to hear. Comic Sarah Tiana tells her epic Serial Dater story from years ago and what has transpired since. Heather shares her opinion on Vicki's accusations about David beating Shannon Beador on Real Housewives of OC.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 72 -  Josh Altman from Million Dollar Listing
episodes.summary: Josh Altman from Million Dollar Listing on Bravo spills all the secrets on his co stars/realtors and his tips for negotiating and dating.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 71 - Major Serial Dater Update, Sexual Harassment,  AJ Gibson & Billy Bush
episodes.summary: Heather along with AJ Gibson gets into #RHOC #RHONJ and Heather reveals the most juicy sexual harassment story ever on the job, late in life lesbians and more! Enjoy!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 70 - Chris Franjola, Sarah Colona & Donald Trump!
episodes.summary: Serial Sister and Serial Dater updates! Comedians Sarah Colona and Chris Franjola talk about Donald Trump and Billy Bush. Also, Heather and Sarah role play as if they were sexually harassing Chris. Heather re enacts RHOC and RHONJ and talks about her new consulting business to help real housewives.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 69 - Stassi Schroeder
episodes.summary: Stassi Schroeder from Vanderpump Rules shares all from her childhood of multiple divorces, her love  of comedy and at one time Jax and now being totally single. Heather also recaps RHONJ and gets deeper Brangelina & Jon Benet.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop Ep - 68 - Ashley Iaconetti
episodes.summary: Don't be afraid of hot fun virgins over 25! Heather was one and so is her guest from Bachelor in Paradise, Ashley I. Together Heather and Ashley go deep into their dating lives which is both hilarious and embarrassing. Plus Heather acts out RHONJ and RHOC episodes and gets into Jim Carey's Venereal diseases, Anthony Weiner's Weiner and Little Women LA.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop Ep - 67 - Lance Bass
episodes.summary: Lance Bass joins to discuss his new show Finding Prince Charming aka The Gay Bachelor. They also discuss Jon Benet, Angelina filing for divorce and RHOC. Heather shares a listener's Serial dater story too.

episodes.title: BONUS: Introducing Secrets, Crimes & Audiotape
episodes.summary:
Today, we bring you a special preview of Secrets, Crimes & Audiotape, a new audio drama podcast told week after week.  Secrets, Crimes & Audiotape will feature stories about crime, mystery, love, conspiracy… Some will be dramas; some will be comedies. All of them will bring you an immersive audio experience, where instead of watching the action you can picture yourself in the middle of it.  Secrets, Crimes & Audiotape is brought to you by Wondery, the podcast network that Juicy Scoop is a part of. 

Subscribe on iTunes, Stitcher, Wondery.com or wherever you listen to podcasts, or here: smarturl.it/sca

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 66 - MAD TV's Carlie Craig
episodes.summary: Heather is joined by hilarious Mad TV cast member and pop star impressionist Carlie Craig. Plus, Heather breaks down RHONY reunion and why Katie Holmes has never gone public with Janie Foxx. Then Heather & Kate Casey are at odds over who killed Jon Benet.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 65 - Sarah Colonna
episodes.summary: Hilarious Comic Sarah Colonna joins to talk Lifetime movies, Anthony Weiner, J Lo and Casper breakup and her new Seattle Seahawk husband. Plus Heather breaks down RHONY, RHONJ, RHOC & Bachelor in Paradise and more hot topics.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 64 Part 2 of Olympic Athlete and Call Girl Suzy Favor Hamilton
episodes.summary: Part 2 of the super juicy interview with Olympic runner turned high class call girl and NY Times Best Selling author, Suzy Favor Hamilton. Heather talks Anthony Weiner, Naya Rivera, Drew Barrymore and recaps Real Housewives of New York, OC and New Jersey. It's such a good episode, you're welcome in advance.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 63 - Olympic Athlete and Call Girl Suzy Favor Hamilton
episodes.summary: Olympic runner turned high class call girl turned NY Times Best Selling author of "Fast Girl" Suzy Favor Hamilton answers every juicy question. Heather talks Jon Benet and Real Housewives of NY.  Then Davy Rothbart from the Found podcast shares items he and his listeners have found including a baby left in a subway.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 62 - Flipping Out's Jeff Lewis
episodes.summary: Jeff Lewis from Bravo's Flipping Out talks babies, assistants and real housewives. He really shares a lot! Heather talks about her husband's friend's 25 yr old fiance.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 61 - RHOC's Kelly Dodd
episodes.summary: Heather is finally with her new podcast network Wondery! She shares a juicy online dating story and then get ready for the best, the juiciest and funniest interview with RHOC newest housewife Kelly Dodd. Heather gets all your questions answered and really goes deep! Enjoy!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 60 - Special Bonus Episode for dedicated Juicy Scoopers!
episodes.summary: Special Bonus Episode for dedicated Juicy Scoopers!  We found Heather's old boyfriend who she has been searching for thanks to a listener. Heather tells the juicy details plus she delves into sexual harassment at Fox News and shares personal stories of other victims.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 59 - Michael Phelp's Former Girlfriend Taylor Chandler
episodes.summary: Heather interviews Swimming Olympian Michael Phelps' former girlfriend Taylor Lianne Chandler and she gives all the juicy scoop details. Then Heather breaks down her Bachelor in Paradise and housewives with Kate Casey.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 58 - RHOC's Tamra Judge Part 2 & Jenni Pulos
episodes.summary: Part 2 of Heather's very personal interview with Real Housewives of OC star Tamra Judge. Also, from Bravo's Flipping Out, Jenni Pulos breaks down Taylor Swift, JFk Jr., OJ's gloves, Bachelorette, RHOC. Plus a juicy serial dater story from a listener.
tags: The Real Housewives Of Orange County

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 57 RHOC's Tamra Barney Part 1
episodes.summary: Tamra Judge from Real Housewives of OC gives juicy scoop about fake friends vying for screen time, old boyfriends and her ugly divorce. Heather gets into Kimye & Taylor, the snap chatting awful Playmate and the worst bachelorette party email ever. Also, Heathet breaks down The Bachelorette, RHOC and Melania Trump. Enjoy.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 56 - Serial Dater Update & Chris Franjola
episodes.summary: Might be the best episode yet! Juicy Serial Dater update! There is another victim! Hilarious comic Chris Franjola joins to talk about Sarah Colonna's wedding and how he came close but was never molested. Heather tells 2 super juicy tails involving golf balls & running into an old boyfriend. Heather breaks down The Bachelorette & RHOC too!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 55 - Stuttering John & Christina Pazsitzky
episodes.summary: Comic Stuttering John Melendez joins and we discuss super juicy topics like the hooker scandal with the NYPD and if OJ is Khloe's dad. John also shares his own journey as a parent of a transgender child. Then the hilarious Christina Pazsitzky talks working in Hollywood, motherhood and how major disappointments can lead to the best things in life.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 54 - Shannon Beador & Monica Ten-Kate
episodes.summary: Might be the Juiciest and funniest episode yet! Heather is joined by her real friend and real Housewife Shannon Beador of OC and much is revealed about Vicki, behind the scenes and the making of a reality show. Then Medium and TV star Monica Ten-Kate unexpectedly talks to both Heather's parents from heaven and many intimate family secrets are revealed.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 53 - Natalie Halcro & Olivia Pierson of WAGS
episodes.summary: Conclusion of #SerialDater with the 3 women who all dated the same money borrowing, cheating paddle boarder. I deep into Faye Resnick's book and OJ; the Bill Clintons mistresses, Britney Spears & Melissa Ethridge. Then I get the scoop about dating professional athletes from Natalie & Olivia stars of WAGS. Not all black men are blessed down there.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 52 - Cary And Mark Deuber From Real Housewives of Dallas
episodes.summary: The 2nd segment of #SerialDater with 3 the women who dated the same guy at the same time. Plus Heather gets into the latest Hollywood juicy scoop covering Brangelina, Jen & Justin, Amber Heard and Johnny Depp. Then Cary Deuber from Real Housewives of Dallas joins with her plastic surgeon husband, Mark. They talk the show, housewives divorces and filler fiascos.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 51 - Jenna and Bodhi Elfman
episodes.summary: The juiciest dating story ever begins the new segment #Serialdater where 3 women realized they were all dating the same guy, at the same time, became friends and then talked to Heather together! Then Jenna Elfman and her equally hilarious husband, Bodhi join to share their own juicy Hollywood stories and then Heather writes a Lifetime  movie on the spot based on their lives. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 50 - Serial Sister Conclusion
episodes.summary: Serial Sister concludes... for now. Heather does hot topics including The Bachelorette. Comedian & author Bonnie McFarlane talks about her hilarious memoir. Heather and Bonnie talk golfing husbands, murdering spouses and Real Housewives of NY. Comic & host Ben Gleib joins to talk his stand up special, Blac Chyna & Ozzie & Sharon

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 49 - Playboy Playmate Holly Madison
episodes.summary: With the Serial Sister saga winding down Heather prepares to move on to another juicy topic. Heather tells the story of when she got financially taken by a guy she was dating. Plus Holly Madison is this week's guest and she gives us all the juicy scoop about her life in and post Playboy Mansion.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 48 - Actress Illeana Douglas and Kate Casey
episodes.summary: More Serial Sister! Kate Casey joins to talk housewives, Tori and Dean & Kendra. Actress and author of "I Blame Dennis Hopper" Illeana Douglas shares her juicy Hollywood stories and life as a child of hippies.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 47 - Comic Jen Kirkman
episodes.summary: Even more juicy than last week's Serial Sister is this week's. The story of Heather's siblings began on episode 35. Then hilarious comic & author Jen Kirkman joins to discuss Angie & Brad;  how Beyoncé & Jay Z are like the Clintons; who Monica Lewinsky should date and people who marry prisoners. This might be the juiciest episode to date! You're welcome!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 46 - Comedian Ali Wong
episodes.summary: The most explosive episode of serial sister yet. Then comedian Ali Wong discusses her NETFLIX stand up special and she and Heather discuss motherhood guilt. Plus Ali shares her 3 juiciest dating stories.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 45 - Comedian Adam Ray
episodes.summary: What does a murder, a hit-an-run-car crash and a drug addict have in common? Heather's sister of course! Find out how all four are connected in the 11th installment of #Serial Sister. Plus we have comedian Adam Ray joining Heather to talk about why Kelly Ripa's new co-host should be a big-tall gay white guy, how the life of Jay-Z's mistress' may be in mortal danger and why incest is making a comeback.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 44 - Comedian and Actor Michael McDonald
episodes.summary: 10th installment of #SerialSister which began on episode 35. Then Heather is joined by non related but always hilarious Michael McDonald, best known for Stuart on MadTV but is now writing and directing for TV and movies. They talk sketch comedy, Mad TV, high class hookers, finale of Girls and housewives.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 43 - Comedian Jonathan Kite & Actress Keesha Sharp
episodes.summary: Heather tells the 9th installment of her very personal story of #SerialSister which began on Episode 35. Jonathan Kite, the hilarious actor on 2 Broke Girls, master impressionist and stand up comic tells about doing his Vince Vaughn for Vince. Keesha Sharp, gorgeous and talented actress from People vs OJ tells two very juicy Hollywood stories about her own rise to the top. Enjoy.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 42 - Family Guy Writer Gary Jenetti
episodes.summary: It's the 8th installment of #SerialSister/Brother which began on episode 35. Heather as Drew Barrymore tells you why she is getting divorced. Hilarious writer Gary Jenetti and Heather then talk Real Housewives, if the Property Brothers are gay and Scientology.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 41 - Lauren Weedman
episodes.summary: Heather shares the 7th installment of #SerialSister/Brother/Sibling. Juicy scoop on Real Housewives and what is really happening between Yolanda & Lisa Rinna. Plus talk on Madonna, Padma & Jackie O. Then Heather interviews author/actress Lauren Weedman about how she found out her husband was sleeping with their babysitter.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 40 - Kato Kaelin
episodes.summary: It's the 6th Installment of #SerialSister which began on episode 35. Kato Kaelin is the guest who made out with Heather once. He answers everyone of yours and Heather's questions about the OJ Trial revealing details even Heather didn't know. This might be the juiciest interview yet. Enjoy.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 39 - Kristen Doute
episodes.summary: Heathers tells the 5th installment of Serial Sister which began on Episode 35, if you want to catch up. Then even if you've never watched Vanderpump Rules you will love hearing about all the behind scenes goings on that happen on a reality show when Kristen Doute answers every question. She gives the juiciest never told before scoop you won't believe. You're welcome!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 38 - Erika Jayne
episodes.summary: Newest real housewife of Beverly Hills sensation Erika Jayne answers all of your & Heather's questions, 4th installment of serial sister & lots juicy tabloid scoop

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 37 - Margaret Cho
episodes.summary: Margaret Cho joins to talk Oscars, Kesha & Kanye. Margaret tells a super juicy story of her own. Heather gets into Cheryl Tiegs body shaming comment & more on #SerialSister.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 36 - Kate Flannery
episodes.summary: Heather tells the next installment of Serial Sister and talks to Kate Flannery, the hilarious Meredith from The Office. Heather gives Juicy Scoop on her stand up show in Aspen, The Bachelor & Housewives.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 35 - Comic Chris Franjola
episodes.summary: For the first time Heather shares the story of her wedding and the chaotic role her sister played.  Plus a quick breakdown of The Bachelor then we catch up with Comic Chris Franjola to discuss The Grammys, Kanye, Twitter wars, Little Women and no glove love.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 34 - Kate Casey & Mike Young
episodes.summary: Love and Knuckles blogger Kate Casey stops by the Juicy Scoop for a hilarious Real Housewives of Beverly Hills recap, plus comedian Mike Young stops by to talk to Heather about how getting knocked out and his nose broken into little tiny pieces at a comedy show inspired his new film "A Stand Up Guy".

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 33 - Jillian Barberie
episodes.summary: On this week's Juicy Scoop Heather is joined by hilarious & outspoken TV personality Jillian Barberie. They talk dating prisoners, OJ, Manson murders & Britney Spears and more.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 32 - Comedian Josh Wolfe
episodes.summary: Heather welcomes comedian and former Chelsea Lately cast mate Josh Wolf to the Juicy Scoop this week to reminisce about their time working on E!'s hit late night tv show, stealing jokes and what it's like to be a comedian and a full time parent. Plus the The Katydids, the cast of TV Land's hit tv show Teachers, stops by to talk about why teaching is the most noble and at the same time most adulteress profession.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 31 - Heather Responds To Chelsea Handler
episodes.summary: Heather responds to what Chelsea Handler said about her on Howard Stern.  She is joined by the hilarious Amy Phillips and they talk housewives, The Bachelor, Ashton Kutcher getting special massages & Madonna.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 30 - Lisa Ann Walter
episodes.summary: On this week's episode of Juicy Scoop Heather gives us a behind the scenes look at the golden globes and her personal encounters & conversations with Amy Schumer, Regina King, Jerry Seinfeld & Lisa Rinna. Then actress Lisa Ann Walter tells the intimate story of finding out her husband of 10 years was gay and so much more juicy scoop.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 29 - Christy Stratton
episodes.summary: Heather McDonald welcomes King of the Hill producer and writer Christy Stratton to Juicy Scoop this week to talk about what it's like to work on one of the most successful TV shows of all time, why RHOBH's Yolanda Foster may be faking her Lyme disease and why Heather's young son is voting for Donald Trump.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 28 - Dr. Drew Pinsky
episodes.summary: Dr. Drew Pinksy stop by this week's episode of Juicy Scoop to talk about Charlie Sheen's addiction problems, raising triplets and needing counseling for being a workaholic.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 27 - Comedian Jamie Lee
episodes.summary: Heather McDonald welcomes comedian Jamie Lee to the podcast to talk about why Gwen and Blake Shelton won't last, why you shouldn't hire a super hot nanny and Ben Affleck's new white trash tattoo, and why he's still hot regardless of his trailer park stamp. Plus we devote 5-seconds to remember Anna Nicole Smith and all of her great contributions to our culture.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 26 - Julie and Brandy From Bravo's The People's Couch
episodes.summary: Julie Goldman and Brandy Howard of Bravo's hit TV Show "The People's Couch" stop by the Juicy Scoop to talk to Heather about all the gossip surrounding David and Yolanda Foster's sudden breakup, what it's like to get paid to watch TV and why they believe that Kris Jenner should be admired and not hated.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 25 - Brandi Glanville Unleashed!
episodes.summary: RHOBH's Brandi Glanville stops by the Juicy Scoop to talk about life after Housewives, why she thinks Lisa Rinna is crazy and hiding some deep dark secrets. Plus she spills to Heather what was calculated and what wasn't during her time on The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 24 - Murder On Jennifer Aniston's Honeymoon?
episodes.summary: Heather and special guest comedian Jo Koy dive deep into the mysterious death of a hollywood producer's death and friend of Jennifer Aniston on the Friends' star recent honeymoon. Plus we get the inside scoop on the shocking divorce of David and Yolanda Foster! Has David already found another woman???

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 23 - Scheana Shay Of Vanderpump Rules
episodes.summary: Scheana Shay of Bravo's hit TV show Vanderpump Rules stops by the Juicy Scoop to talk about her feud with Stassi Schroeder, Jax Taylor's kleptomania and why her husband never speaks on the show. Plus Heather talks about how penis and crack go together better than peanut butter and jelly according to new video of Charlie Sheen.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 22 - Charlie Sheen and Gavin Rossdale's Cheating Heart
episodes.summary: Not Winning! Comedian Justin Martindale and Hollywoodlife's Editor In Chief Bonnie Fuller join the Juicy Scoop to talk about Charlie Sheen's Not-So-Shocking announcement, rumors about Gavin Rossdale cheating on Gwen Stefani with their Nanny and why taking naked selfies with your kid's school iPad is a bad idea.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 21 - Caitlyn Crashes Kris Jenners B-Day Party
episodes.summary: Heather gives an eye witness account of Kris Jenner's huge 60th Birthday party and how Caitlyn Jenner managed to crash the shindig in an unexpected way. Plus Theo Von tells us his Tinder horror stories.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 20 - Rosie O'Donnell, Scientology and Watch What Crappens
episodes.summary: Heather takes on hard hitting issues this week. She's touches on everything from Rosie O'donell's ungrateful daughter, how Scientology tried to control what would air on Chelsea Lately and how to get rid of camel toe. Plus Ben Mandelker and Ronnie Karam of Watch What Crappens join Heather to give us the inside scoop on The Real Housewives Of Orange County.
tags: The Real Housewives Of Orange County

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 19 - Kris Jenner
episodes.summary: Kris Jenner stops by the Juicy Scoop to talk about OJ Simpson and the upcoming TV Series based on the Nicole Brown Simpson murder, how she got talked into doing a reality tv show and whether or not she always agrees with her children's decisions when it comes to their love lives.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 18 - New Jersey Housewives and Prison Sex
episodes.summary: On this week's episode of Juicy Scoop Heather, along with comedian Chris Farah,  talk about the dirty sex letters RHONJ's Teresa Giudice and Joe Giudice write to each other in prison, why Joe is not attractive enough for prison rapists, and whether or not Abraham Lincoln was gay.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 17 - Playboy Playmate Jessa Hinton
episodes.summary: Fellow podcaster and Playboy Playmate Jessa Hinton joins Heather for a dose of Juicy Scoops on this week's podcast. The two talk about who took Kim Kardashian's virginity, Sister Wives' Meri Brown getting "catfished" by a woman, and Rosie O'Donnell's estranged daughter.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 16 - Olympic Athlete Hookers & Coked Out Debutantes
episodes.summary: On this week's episode of Juicy Scoop Heather dives head first into the seedy lives of a former Olympic athlete turned high priced hooker, a coked out dead debutante leading a double life, and turns her investigative eye towards OJ Simpson on the 20th Anniversary of the "Trial Of The Century." Plus Brian Howie of "The Great Love Debate" stops by to talk about dating in the digital age..

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 15 - Comedian Jill Bartlett & Blogger Kate Casey
episodes.summary: Is Meg Ryan broke and destitute because she spent all of her money on plastic surgery? Did Blake Shelton dump Miranda Lambert for Gwen Stefani? Is Tom Cruise leaving Scientology? Heather welcomes comedian Jill Bartlett and blogger Kate Casey to dive deep into these important stories to give us the Juicy Scoop.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 14 - When Life Gives You Lemons, Put 9 Of Them In A Bowl!
episodes.summary: When life gives you lemons put 9 of them in a bowl! Heather welcomes Bryan Safi to the Juicy Scoop to give us the dish on RHOC's Shannon Beador and her husbands infidelity. Plus we find out why Heather thinks Bethany Frankel is the ultimate Housewife.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 13 - Perez Hilton & Fortune Feimster
episodes.summary: Heather sits down with Perez Hilton and Chelsea Lately writer and comedian Fortune Feimster for a Miss America Re-cap

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 12 - Tamra Judge & April Richardson
episodes.summary: Heather welcomes Tamra Judge of Bravo's Real Housewives of Orange County to give us the scoop on everything from whether or not Vicki's boyfriend Brooks Ayers really has cancer to her leaked sex tape. Plus comedian April Richardson talks about how she and two other women were all dating the same man at the same time!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 11 - RHONY's Jill Zarin and Ashley Madison
episodes.summary: Heather talks about getting a "I'm guilty" bouquet of flowers from her husband. Then she get's "Real" with RHONY's Jill Zarin by getting to the rotten core of Bravo's hit TV show about the fabulous ladies of the "Big Apple". Rumors, check. Gossip, check. Backstabbing, check.  Juicy Scoops, you'd better believe it!

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 10 - Ross Mathews plus Did Keith Cheat
episodes.summary: Heather dishes some juicy scoop on the recent Keith and Nicole rumors, plus talks about Demi's knees.  Then Entertainment TV star Ross Mathews and his life partner Salvadore stop by the studio to chat up more delicious stories from the Hollywood rumor mill.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 09 - Jen Kirkman & Gavin's Gone Gay
episodes.summary: Fellow Chelsea alum Jen Kirkman joins Heather to dish Juicy Scoop on Gwen and Gavin's split and who Jennifer Garner should shack up with. Plus Heather reveals her Sex In the City 3 script and Jen dishes out Hollywood's Worst Actress list.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 08 - Ben's Nanny, Heather Dubrow & More
episodes.summary: Heather dishes on the specific reason why she thinks the Bennifer Nanny-gate blew up...and why Tom and Suri don't talk anymore. Then, Real Housewives of the OC star Heather Dubrow checks in to share Juicy Scoop from her life.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 07 - Mistress Nannies & Stephanie Pratt
episodes.summary: Heather dishes Juicy Scoop on why so many successful actors leave their wives for their nannies. Then, former star of MTV's "The Hills" Stephanie Pratt talks about her new show "Made in Chelsea" and her book "Made in Reality."

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 06 - Botched Star Dr. Paul Nassif
episodes.summary: Heather breaks down Ben Affleck's not-so nice guy rep and talks with Botched and former RHOBH star surgeon Dr. Paul Nassif.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 05 - Idiot test with Ben Gleib
episodes.summary: Heather considers buying a convent and the nuns inside it. Then Idiot Test (GSN) Host Ben Gleib stops by to let everyone know that he's no longer crucifixion ready and doesn't want to date anyone who carries pushpins.  Ben also puts Heather thru an impromptu Idiot Test.  Listen to see how she does.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 04 - Flipping Out with Jenni Pulos
episodes.summary: Heather talks about Caitlyn's potential new love and why Ben Affleck can get away with A LOT of crap.  Then Flipping Out (Bravo) star Jenni Pulos jumps in to chat about everything from auditioning to impotence.  Great show.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 03 - Sarah Colonna
episodes.summary: Heather talks about her husband's backfiring diarrhea joke and the faux shock over the "Bennifer" break up.  Then comic pal Sarah Colonna joins the fun.  Plus Heather takes her first calls.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 02 - Chris Franjola
episodes.summary: First, Heather shares some 4th of July nightmare and Blue-Ball stories.  Then her former almost-lover, Comedian Chris Franjola shares some Juicy Scoop on the threesomes and other oddball erotic offers he's been offered during his stand-up tours.

episodes.title: Juicy Scoop - Ep - 01 - Shannon Beador
episodes.summary: In this premiere episode of Juicy Scoop Heather McDonald wonders whether Caitlin Jenner got ass implants and if Michael Jackson would've become transgender.  Then she says F-U Charlie Sheen and gets into the RHOC behind the scenes drama with Shannon Beador.
